title: One Bedroom Garden Apt facing back of building
posting_body: This is a quiet one bedroom apartment with a private patio and garden area off the living room which faces the back of the building -- lined with trees and gardens.
The apartment is in a safe neighborhood and a convenient location - one block from Fillmore Street and a block from Japantown.
Centrally located and walking distance to two supermarkets, several pharmacies, theatres, many restaurants and shops ...
and, just a few minutes drive from downtown.
Multiple downtown and cross-town muni lines nearby.
Trash and water (hot and cold) are included in rent.
One-year lease with a security deposit equal to one month's rent, then month to month lease.
This is in a rent-controlled building so no surprise rent increases.
Available for immediate showing and move-in!
The apartment is located on Webster Street between Bush and Sutter Streets.
